field_descriptions.foreign_asset: ID of the imported asset on the foreign chain.
field_descriptions.ratio: Ratio of the initial stake to the amount claimed.
field_descriptions.counterstake_coef: The counterstake must be that larger than the current stake.
field_descriptions.challenging_periods: Challenging periods (in hours) for regular amounts.
field_descriptions.large_challenging_periods: Challenging periods (in hours) for large amounts.
field_descriptions.min_tx_age: Minimum tx age before it can be claimed.
field_descriptions.large_threshold: Threshold that defines what amount is treated as large.
